name: template.data.gouv.fr

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && yarn dist-css && yarn dist-site
scripts.dist-site: copyfiles images/* images/**/* fonts/**/* index.html dist
scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist && yarn prepublish-css && copyfiles images/* images/icons/* images/favicons/* fonts/**/* dist
scripts.prepublish-css: postcss --output dist/style/main.css src/css/index.css && NODE_ENV=production postcss --output dist/style/main.min.css src/css/index.css
